libvirtManager module¶

class libvirtManager.ComputeManager(config)[source]¶

Bases: object

defineXML(name, vmProperty)[source]¶

Define the xml to use to generate the VM name = name of the virtual machine vmProperty = map with the properties of the VM: { memory:memory requirement(KiB) vcpu:numeber of core needed disk:{location:disk location

type:type of the disk}

interfaces:[list of interfaces] }

deleteNF(name)[source]¶

Destroy a VM

getDiskInfo(nfID, localNFID)[source]¶

Get the information of the disk for the VM

instantiateNF(name, vmProperty)[source]¶

Instantiate a VM
